channel.title: Merc living past 2nd contract
channel.description:
#### What happened? It said I would commit suicide, I didn't. Next night... I didn't. Then they killed me because they thought I was lying.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? I should have died after 2nd contract died
#### Steps to reproduce: No idea, started with Invoker (1) as contract, got Seeker (6) and second. Maybe Seeker was converted? No way to know.
#### Comments: At least it was funny.

item.title: Merc living past 2nd contract
item.dc:creator: Bart_Auringer
item.description:
What happened? It said I would commit suicide, I didn’t. Next night… I didn’t. Then they killed me because they thought I was lying.

What was SUPPOSED to happen? I should have died after 2nd contract died

Steps to reproduce: No idea, started with Invoker (1) as contract, got Seeker (6) and second. Maybe Seeker was converted? No way to know.

Comments: At least it was funny.
